QuestData.Title: Hunt for Yenniku
QuestData.Description: A doom, there is. A doom on my chief's youngest son, Yenniku. As is a custom with our people, he was given to the Gurubashi Trolls of Zul'Gurub, but after my tribe, the Darkspear tribe, left with the orc Thrall, poor Yenniku was lost to us. I was sent from distant Orgrimmar, back to Stranglethorn, to search for my chief's son.$B$BAnd I believe the Bloodscalp tribe has him.$B$BIf you would help me, then hunt the Bloodscalps. You may find them to the north. Gather their tusks and return to me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain 6 Bloodscalp Tusks from Bloodscalp trolls in the Bal'lal Ruins.
QuestData.CompletionText: $C. Show me you have made prey of the Bloodscalp tribe.$B$BShow me your trophies.
QuestData.RewardText: These are good tusks, $n. You prove that you have the strength to hunt the Bloodscalps.$B$BAnd that is good, because you are not done hunting them.
